org.trianacode.gui.components.triana

Interface OpenGroupComponentModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapComponentModel, TrianaComponentModel

    public interface OpenGroupComponentModel
    The model for an open group

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JPopupMenu getMultipleSelectedPopup(Task[] tasks) 
      javax.swing.Action getOpenGroupAction(TaskGraph taskgraph) 
      TaskGraphPanel getOpenGroupComponent(TaskGraph taskgraph, TrianaClient client) 
      javax.swing.JPopupMenu getOpenGroupPopup(TaskGraph taskgraph) 

    • Method Detail

      • getOpenGroupPopup

        javax.swing.JPopupMenu getOpenGroupPopup(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Returns:
        the popup menu for the open group (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)

      • getOpenGroupAction

        javax.swing.Action getOpenGroupAction(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Returns:
        the action that is invoked when a group is activated (e.g. the workspace is double-clicked). If null is returned the default workspace action is used.

      • getOpenGroupComponent

        TaskGraphPanel getOpenGroupComponent(TaskGraph taskgraph,
                                   TrianaClient client)
        Returns:
        the taskgraph panel used to represent the specified taskgraph (if null is returned then the default component is used)

      • getMultipleSelectedPopup

        javax.swing.JPopupMenu getMultipleSelectedPopup(Task[] tasks)
        Returns:
        the popup menu when multiple tasks are selected in the workspace (if null is returned then the default popup menu is used, return a empty popup menu for no popup)
